title: If you're gonna remove dfg
body:
Remove {{champion:238}} while you're at it.

At least DFG requires gold before you can start one shotting people.

replies.body: To be fair Zed needs a Brutlizer and Cutlass, and even then he will only kill spuisher mids like Lux, Ori, or your dumb ADC who doesn't react to SS pings. Also Zed can't kill tanks till late game, DFG, especially with with 15% max health magic damage, allowed some burst champions like Veigar or Malz, to kill tanks.
after a certain point, as you said, once the opponent realizes (oh, I can build armor/zhonya) then your damage is heavily reduced(which is why he builds LW)

at least zed's death mark actually takes time and other skills damage to blow up, meaning that it requires skill to be used to its maximum effectiveness

unlike dfg->nuke them with veigar ulti and q and ignite=dead.
If you need to ignite as Veigar after DFG+R+Q, then you need to work on your Q farm or stop trying to R a tank. lol

I'm just saying that it guarantees a kill regardless when you do it. If they somehow heal or have a healing ability, ignite will greatly reduce the chance of them living through your combo.
And early on..as in at level 6-8 which is when I usually get my DFG, DFG-R-Q will not always 100%-0 them, unless you have q'd every single minion in every wave up to that point, which, unless you had blue buff the entire time and max cdr, is not really possible.
last i checked all he needed was {{item:3134}} to start pressing r to win. i mean i guess you can throw a q and maybe a auto in there and they'll die.

I don't think you've ever actually played Zed then. His ult at level 1 doesnt actually do that much damage by itself unless you can pile damage while the buff is active.

People think Zed is faceroll easy, but in actuality he is one of the highest skill cap champions in the game.

do they plan to replace it or just completely get rid of the item? How drunk are they? I use grasp on basicly every freakin AP champ i use, because it's a very usefull item against other champs that are stronger than me....

and Veigar and Malz were gated by being able to do this to only one target. Some will argue that Zedd is too but the videos of him 1 vs 3 killing people will say otherwise. Albeit he was ahead but thats due to his crazy safe laning and dueling potential from Death Mark and his W. Jungler ganks W out, or if you're ahead R your lane opponent who is likely gold starved pop Q and E on em plus cutlass and a few AAs and R out then your going 1 for 0 and wasting Jungle's time and resources attempting to kill you and failing since you can still get away from them with W shadow + flash

ultimately, all of Zed's abilities still require skill/aiming(skillshots) to fully take advantage of the damage that will occur, where as veigar and malz did not so much have to do that, especially with malz's silence and veigar's stun. Once you hit that...gg DFG and combo= dead

Also, you can DEFINITELY kill zed before he kills you if you utilize cc properly, and if you do it right, you will prevent his mark from dealing that much damage to you, meaning Zed's ulti actually does have counterplay because he doesnt have cc. He just has damage, and a lot of potential damage after level 6.
